Package com.mfront.front.controller

Class FrontController

java.lang.Object
com.mfront.front.controller.FrontController
@Controller public class FrontController extends Object
Controller class for handling front-end requests related to patient management.

    • litsPatients

      @GetMapping("/patient/list") public String litsPatients(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles GET requests to list all patients.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to be populated with patient data
      Returns:
      the name of the view template to be rendered

    • showPatientInfo

      @GetMapping("/patient/info/{firstname}/{lastname}") public String showPatientInfo(@PathVariable String firstname, @PathVariable String lastname, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles GET requests to display patient information.
      Parameters:
      firstname - the first name of the patient
      lastname - the last name of the patient
      model - the model to be populated with patient information
      Returns:
      the name of the view template to be rendered

    • addPatient

      @GetMapping("/patient/add") public String addPatient(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles GET requests to display the form for adding a new patient.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to be passed to the view template
      Returns:
      the name of the view template to be rendered

    • createPatient

      @PostMapping("/patient/create") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createPatient(@RequestBody PatientBean patientBean)
      Handles POST requests to create a new patient.
      Parameters:
      patientBean - the patient data to be added
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the success or failure of the operation

    • updatePatient

      @GetMapping("/patient/update/{firstname}/{lastname}") public String updatePatient(@PathVariable String firstname, @PathVariable String lastname, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles GET requests to display the form for updating patient information.
      Parameters:
      firstname - the first name of the patient
      lastname - the last name of the patient
      model - the model to be populated with patient information
      Returns:
      the name of the view template to be rendered

    • updateDataPatient

      @PutMapping("/patient/update/data") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateDataPatient(@RequestBody PatientBean patientBean)
      Handles PUT requests to update patient information.
      Parameters:
      patientBean - the updated patient data
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the success or failure of the operation

      commentBean - the comment data to be added
